snippet.title: The Way of Death - Gameplay Trailer #2
snippet.description:
The Way of Death is a souls-like game set in a world inspired by feudal Japan from the Edo period. Take the challenge in the arcade sword combat system prepared for a top-down perspective. Defeat opponents and bosses, and explore the surroundings full of secrets.

Wishlist The Way of Death now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2346000/480?utm_source=yt&utm_campaign=gameplayTrailer

Follow the developer on Twitter: https://x.com/KusykD
Follow The Way of Death on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@the.way.of.death
Follow The Way of Death on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/the.way.of.death.game/

WORK IN PROGRESS - DOES NOT REPRESENT THE FINAL LOOK OF THE GAME
